text:
Company Background:
Obrien, Bates and Figueroa is a renowned construction company specializing in high-quality stucco masonry. We pride ourselves on our commitment to craftsmanship and innovation while fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace.

Job Type:
Full-Time

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled stucco mason to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will possess extensive experience in stucco application, repair, and finishing. Our commitment to diversity includes a strong focus on representation from the queer community, and we encourage individuals of diverse sexual orientations and gender identities to apply. 

Responsibilities:
- Apply stucco to building exteriors, ensuring a smooth and durable finish.
- Perform stucco repair and maintenance tasks as needed.
- Collaborate with team members to complete projects on time and within budget.
- Maintain a safe and clean work environment.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Proven experience as a stucco mason or similar role.
- Familiarity with various stucco techniques and materials.
- Strong attention to detail and excellent craftsmanship.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Commitment to safety and quality.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from $40,000 to $55,000 annually, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid time off and sick leave.
- Opportunities for professional development and training.
- Supportive and inclusive work environment.

At Obrien, Bates and Figueroa, we believe in the power of diverse voices, especially those from the LGBTQ+ community. We strive to build a workforce that reflects this diversity and encourages individuals from these communities to apply.
